Name: Specter
About the game: SPECTER is a simple but powerful tool that allows Artists, Designers, Directors and Creatives to channel their ideas into tangible concepts. Use it in pre-production, whether you are a Director or Creative in the movie industry or a hobbyist you can take your mental images and block then out with ease. Place posable characters and props in the environment and create your perfect imaginative scene. SPECTER is also a great tool for Concept Artists and Matte Painters. Easily create your scene with the provided assets, light and frame your image perfectly! Use the tool to create still images as guidelines for production or paint over for production images. (Note: Specter is not a 3D Modeling Toolkit nor is a substitute for any modeling or animation tool. Specter is a previsualization tool.) Current Features Transform, scale and rotate scene elements Primitive Library for creating objects from shapes Lighting support including Directional Light, Point and Spot (Includes Shadow Casting) Fully posable characters with Inverse Kinematics (Hands, Waist, Head, Feet) Built in screen-capture tool for saving out frame stills Save and Load Scenes Planned Features Public Scene Sharing More options over material color and lighting color including distance and intensity More scene elements prefabs including vehicles, props, building etc... Environmental prefabs for creating nature inspired scenes (Trees, Plants, Grass) Community driven features! SPECTRE is in Early Access, so please be aware that you may encounter 'Random' bugs during your experience.
